SunBurn Festival

Sunburn is Asia's largest EDM festival held in India. Spread over 4 days, the festival has multiple stages with artists playing simultaneously. The festival is an amalgamation of music, entertainment, food and shopping.

Sunburn is a lifestyle.

Artists

Vini Vici

Martin Garrix

Armin Van Buuren

Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike

Deadmau5

Skrillex

DJ Snake

Hardwell

Tickets

On entering a new year, Sunburn is looking at creating an array of experiences that will give dance music enthusiasts memories that last a lifetime. The festival experience is also going to be enhanced with new technologies & stage designs & themes which will redefine the way entertainment and live music is consumed in the country.

Sunburn Festival 2018, will be hosted at Oxford Golf Resort in Pune, providing a perfect setting to celebrate the new decade of brand Sunburn.

About

Sunburn Festival is India's premier electronic music festival hosting Asia's largest ‘4-day’ Electronic Music Festival. The first Sunburn festival was held in Goa, India in 2007. Artists like Martin Garrix, Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike, Afrojack, Tiesto, DJ Snake, KSHMR ,Hardwell and many more have performed in this festival.

Asia’s biggest dance music festival,Sunburn has been organizing the most loved music festivals since 11 years, that have made a mark in the EDM history of India.

Over 200 hours of Music featuring Trance, House, Electro, Techno, Drum & Bass, Psy-trance, and Experimental – whatever you want, you can get!
